text: Florent Johan Malouda (born 13 June 1980) is a football coach and former professional player who played as a midfielder. Born in French Guiana, he represented both France and French Guiana at international level. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== :Source: Club Season League National cup League cup Continental Other Total
